import React, { Component } from "react"; //import { HeaderWrapper, } from "./style"; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { Icon } from "antd"; import "./header.css"; import { Row, Col } from "antd"; const p = window.location.pathname; var index = 1; class TopHeader extends Component { componentWillMount() { p.indexOf("news")!==-1 ? (index = 2) : (p.indexOf("school")!==-1) ? (index = 3) : (p.indexOf("activity")!==-1) ? (index = 4) : (p.indexOf("contact")!==-1) ? (index = 5) : (index = 1); } render() { return (
首页 快讯 阅链学校 活动 联系我们 登录/注册
); } } export default TopHeader;
